alert.note: Alert for Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Polk and northwestern Warren Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Norwalk, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Additional heavy rainfall of one to 2 inches is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, some street flooding is possible and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Norwalk around 750 PM CDT. Des Moines Int`l Airport around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Principal Park, Southridge Mall, Iowa Events Center and Des Moines. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 65 and 69. Interstate 235 near mile marker 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
